snippet: The State House of Representatives voted 61 to 57 on Wednesday to allow physicians to prescribe marijuana to patients with specific terminal illnesses or debilitating medical conditions.
abstract: Illinois House of Representatives votes 61 to 57 to allow physicians to prescribe marijuana to patients with specific terminal illnesses or debilitating medical conditions.
lead_paragraph: The State House of Representatives voted 61 to 57 on Wednesday to allow physicians to prescribe marijuana to patients with specific terminal illnesses or debilitating medical conditions.
